titleStmt.title: Seneca's answer to Lucilius his quære why good men suffer misfortunes seeing there is a divine providence? / written originally in Latine prose and now translated into English verse by E.S., Esq.
De providentia. English
titleStmt.author: Seneca, Lucius Annaeus, ca. 4 B.C.-65 A.D.
Sherburne, Edward, Sir, 1618-1702.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
